remarks: A deduction for showing that a number equals the square root of another.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Apr-2015.)
statement:
eqsqrd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
eqsqrd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
eqsqrd.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( A ^ 2 ) = B ) $.
eqsqrd.4 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ ( Re ` A ) ) $.
eqsqrd.5 $e |- ( ph -> -. ( _i x. A ) e. RR+ ) $.
eqsqrtd $p |- ( ph -> A = ( sqrt ` B ) ) $.
